page.title: 05SIGNS
page.content: Around our area there are a lot of signs.When we went out we saw lots of these.These are road signs - speed limit , pedestrian , give way etc.Also we saw signs concerned with visitors in our area.Some houses had bed and breakfast signs outside them , others had signs advertising their own garden produce for sale , others selling fish.There were also signs stating that some areas were private - like the road to Cae Glas and Tre Gof.Hotels have signs outside telling the visitors about their establishment.Some signs were put up by estate agents displaying For Sale - Lucas , Bob Parry and Jones and Davis were the most common signs.
